content: ठः {@--1@} An imitative sound, as of a metallic jar rolling down steps; रामाभिषेके मदविह्वलायाः कक्षाच्च्युतो हेमघटस्तरुण्याः . सोपानमार्गे प्रकरोति शब्दं ठठं ठठं ठं ठठठं ठठं ठः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--2@} A loud noise. {@--3@} The disc of the sun or moon. {@--4@} A circle, globe. {@--5@} A cypher. {@--6@} A place resorted to or held sacred by all. {@--7@} An object of sense. {@--8@} An idol, deity. {@--9@} An epithet of Śiva.
